description:
Let Me Memorize II is a fun, colorful and interactive memory game which focuses on testing your memory retention power. The game, specifically designed as an educational tool by experts helps children in identifying and learning things shown in images and also hone their cognition skills by making them memorize images.
The game consists of a square matrix of cards, the upper half characterized by the number 1 and the lower half by the number 2. Beneath the cards marked 1 lies an image and cards marked with 2 lies the name of the images present in cards marked 1,but the order of arrangement is different for both.
Game Play
Select one card from the set of cards marked ‘1’ and follow it up with selecting another one from the set of cards marked ‘2’. If the image in 1 matches its name in 2 you score else the cards are automatically flipped over thereby hiding the image and the name. The catch is that now you know the image lying beneath card marked 1 and the name lying beneath the card marked 2 (but they are hidden now!). Repeat the procedure by selecting a different card from either of the two sets(‘1’ or ‘2’), if you remember correctly you’ll know which card from the other set contains a name of the image. So you see the more you recall the more you rule!.
The game comes in  three different variants each more interesting than the previous with colorful & vivid images that will test your retention power. Based on the type of images there are 3 variants -
* Natural Beauty
* Colour Matching
*  Animals
